mapper.select: SELECT member.*, reportCount FROM member left OUTER JOIN ( SELECT member_id, COUNT(review_idx) AS reportCount FROM report GROUP BY member_id) reportCount ON member.member_id = reportCount.member_id ORDER BY member_date DESC

SELECT COUNT(class_idx) AS 'totalClass' , (SELECT COUNT(class_category) FROM class WHERE class_category = 2) AS 'oneDayClass' , (SELECT COUNT(class_category) FROM class WHERE class_category = 1) AS 'regularClass' FROM class WHERE member_id = #{member_id};
